home.title: Stories
home.subtitle: Choose your adventure. Interactive stories powered by AI — you decide what happens next.
hero.subtitle: Interactive fiction powered by AI. Read, choose, and shape the story — every decision matters.
hero.feature1.title: Choose Your Path
hero.feature1.desc: Every story offers choices. Your decisions shape the narrative — no two playthroughs are the same.
hero.feature2.title: Any Genre
hero.feature2.desc: Fantasy, sci-fi, horror, mystery, romance — explore stories across all genres.
hero.feature3.title: AI-Powered
hero.feature3.desc: Advanced language models create rich, dynamic narratives that respond to your every choice.
hero.feature4.title: Create Stories
hero.feature4.desc: Build your own interactive stories from scratch or generate them from any text.
hero.feature5.title: 7 Languages
hero.feature5.desc: Play stories in English, Russian, Spanish, French, German, Portuguese, and Italian.
hero.feature6.title: Endless Adventures
hero.feature6.desc: AI remembers your choices and adapts the story. Long adventures with context memory.

create.extraPlaceholder: E.g.: make the character more sarcastic, add an accent, use informal speech...

lore.title: World Info / Lorebook
lore.hint: Add lore entries with keywords. When a keyword appears in chat, the entry is injected into the AI's context.
lore.empty: No lore entries yet. Add one to enrich the character's world.

profile.deleteAccountConfirm: This will permanently delete your account, all your stories, and all reading history. This action cannot be undone.
profile.deleteAccountHint: Permanently delete your account and all associated data.
form.avatarRequired: Upload an avatar for public characters
form.name: Story title *
form.taglinePlaceholder: An ancient mystery awaits in the jungle depths
form.personalityPlaceholder: Describe the world, setting, main conflict, and tone. What kind of adventure awaits the reader?
form.structuredTagsHint: Affects narrative style and AI behavior
form.appearancePlaceholder: Describe the character's appearance: height, build, facial features, clothing, distinguishing marks...
form.speechPatternHint: How does the character talk? Accent, catchphrases, vocabulary level, speech quirks.
form.speechPatternPlaceholder: E.g.: Speaks formally, uses archaic words like "forsooth". Stutters when nervous. Always ends sentences with "ya know?"
form.scenarioPlaceholder: Where does the story begin? What is the reader's situation?
form.greetingPlaceholder: The first scene the reader sees. Set the atmosphere and present the first choices.
form.exampleDialoguesPlaceholder:
{{char}}: *adjusts violin* Good day. How may I help you?
{{user}}: Hello!

You can use {{char}} and {{user}} — they'll be replaced with names.
form.greetingHint: Write in second person (you see, you hear). This sets the tone for the entire story.
form.exampleDialoguesHint: Add 2-3 short examples showing the narrative style and choice format.
form.maxTokensHelp: Maximum response length. 1 token ≈ 3-4 characters. Default: 2048.
settings.title: Model & Settings
settings.temperatureTooltip:
Controls response randomness.

0.0 — strictly predictable text.
0.3–0.5 — restrained style, few surprises.
0.7 — balance between accuracy and creativity (default).
1.0+ — more creative, unpredictable responses.
2.0 — maximum randomness, text may become incoherent.

Default: 0.7
settings.topPTooltip:
Limits word selection by cumulative probability (nucleus sampling).

The model considers only the most probable words until their cumulative probability reaches this threshold.

0.5 — only top 50% probable words.
0.9 — wider selection, more diverse text.
1.0 — all words available.

Works together with temperature. Usually changing one is enough.

Default: 0.95
settings.topKTooltip:
Limits word selection by count: the model only picks from K most probable options.

0 — disabled, all words available.
10 — only top 10 words, very predictable.
40–50 — good balance.
100 — almost no restrictions.

Default: 0 (disabled)
settings.frequencyPenaltyTooltip:
Reduces probability of repeating the same words within a single response.

0.0 — no penalty, model may repeat.
0.3–0.5 — light penalty, removes obsessive repeats.
1.0 — noticeable penalty, more diverse text.
2.0 — strong penalty (may hurt coherence).

Default: 0.3
settings.presencePenaltyTooltip:
Penalizes words and phrases that already appeared in the dialogue context. Helps avoid repeating the same descriptions from message to message.

0.0 — no penalty.
0.3 — light penalty, fewer cross-message repeats (recommended).
0.6 — noticeable penalty, more diverse responses.
1.0+ — strong penalty, model actively avoids previously mentioned topics.

Default: 0.3
settings.contextLimitTooltip:
How much conversation history the model sees.

4K — ~10-15 messages, fast responses.
8K — ~25-35 messages, good balance.
16K — ~50-70 messages, deep context.
∞ — no limit, all history (may hit model limits).

Older messages beyond the limit are "forgotten" by the model.

Default: ∞ (no limit)
settings.nsfwBlocked: This model doesn't support mature content
settings.cerebrasNoPenalty: Cerebras does not support frequency/presence penalty. These settings will be ignored.
settings.maxTokensTooltip:
Maximum response length. 1 token ≈ 3-4 characters.

256 — very short (~750 chars).
1024 — short (~3000 chars).
2048 — medium (~6000 chars).
4096 — long (~12000 chars).

Hard limit: response will be cut off if exceeded.

Default: 2048

tagPage.fantasyDesc: Fantasy interactive fiction — magic, quests, mythical creatures, and epic adventures. Shape your own legend.
tagPage.romanceDesc: Romantic interactive stories — love, choices, and relationships. Every decision shapes the story.
tagPage.horrorDesc: Horror interactive fiction — dark atmosphere, suspense, and terrifying choices. Survive the night.
tagPage.modernDesc: Modern-day interactive fiction — realistic scenarios, everyday mysteries, and contemporary adventures.
tagPage.sci_fiDesc: Sci-fi interactive fiction — space exploration, futuristic tech, and cosmic mysteries await.
tagPage.mysteryDesc: Mystery interactive fiction — solve puzzles, uncover clues, and crack the case.
tagPage.adventureDesc: Adventure interactive fiction — explore unknown lands, face challenges, and discover treasures.
featured.title: Story of the Day
about.title: About GrimQuill
about.p1: GrimQuill is a platform for AI-powered choose-your-own-adventure stories. Rich narratives meet advanced language models to create immersive, branching storylines where your choices truly matter.
about.p2: Powered by multiple free AI providers with auto-fallback — your story never stops. Every response offers meaningful choices that shape the narrative in unexpected ways.
about.p3: Create your own interactive stories from scratch or generate them from any text. Explore fantasy, sci-fi, horror, mystery, romance, and more — in 7 languages.
about.f.personas.title: Reader Personas
about.f.personas.desc: Create character profiles for yourself. Be a warrior, a detective, or anyone you want across different stories.
about.f.groupChats.title: Branching Narratives
about.f.groupChats.desc: Every story offers multiple choices. Your decisions create unique story branches that no one else has explored.
about.f.lorebooks.title: Rich Worlds
about.f.lorebooks.desc: Stories come with detailed world-building. The AI weaves lore and context into the narrative seamlessly.
about.f.memory.title: Story Memory
about.f.memory.desc: The AI remembers your choices and story events. Long adventures maintain continuity through intelligent summarization.
about.f.multiChat.title: Multiple Playthroughs
about.f.multiChat.desc: Replay any story with different choices. Each playthrough has its own independent history and outcomes.
about.f.models.title: AI Models
about.f.models.desc: Multiple AI providers ensure the best narrative quality. Models are selected automatically for optimal storytelling.
about.f.importExport.title: Create & Share
about.f.importExport.desc: Build your own interactive stories and share them with the community. Anyone can become a story author.
about.f.multilingual.title: 7 Languages
about.f.multilingual.desc: Play stories in English, Russian, Spanish, French, German, Portuguese, and Italian. Stories auto-translate between languages.
about.f.literary.title: Literary Prose
about.f.literary.desc: Second-person narration that puts you in the story. Rich descriptions, atmosphere, and meaningful choices.
about.f.privacy.title: Privacy First
about.f.privacy.desc: Your stories and choices are private. Delete your account and all data at any time.
about.teamDesc: We believe in the power of interactive storytelling. GrimQuill brings the magic of choose-your-own-adventure books into the AI era — with rich narratives, meaningful choices, and endless possibilities.
terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: By using GrimQuill, you agree to the following terms:
terms.section1: You must be at least 13 years old to use this service. By creating an account, you confirm that you meet this requirement.
terms.section2: You are responsible for the stories you create and the content you generate. Do not create content that promotes real-world harm, involves real persons without consent, or violates applicable laws.
terms.section3: You agree not to abuse the platform, attempt to reverse-engineer the service, or use automated tools to scrape content. We reserve the right to suspend accounts that violate these terms.
terms.section4: GrimQuill is provided as-is. We do not guarantee uninterrupted service or specific model availability. Generated content may contain inaccuracies.
privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: Your privacy matters to us. Here is how we handle your data:
privacy.section1: We collect your email, username, and chat history to provide the service. We do not sell your data to third parties.
privacy.section2: Your data is used solely to operate the service: account management, story delivery, and service improvement. Story content is sent to AI providers for narrative generation.
privacy.section3: We use industry-standard encryption and secure hosting. Passwords are hashed and never stored in plain text.
privacy.section4: You can delete your account at any time from your profile page. This permanently removes all your data, stories, and reading history.
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: Yes! All stories are completely free to play. We use free AI models from multiple providers with automatic fallback for reliability.
faq.a2: Choose a story and start reading. The AI narrator describes scenes and offers you choices. Pick an option or type your own action — the story adapts to your decisions in real-time.
faq.q3: Can I create my own stories?
faq.a3: Yes! Click 'Create Story' in the header. Build a story manually with a premise, setting, and opening scene — or paste any text and let AI generate an interactive story from it.
faq.a4: Fantasy, sci-fi, horror, mystery, romance, adventure, and more. You can also create stories in any genre you imagine.
faq.a5: Yes. Your stories and choices are private and only visible to you. We do not share your data with anyone.
faq.a6: Yes. Go to Profile and use 'Delete Account' in the Danger Zone section. This permanently removes your account, stories, and all reading history.
faq.a7: Personas let you create a character identity for yourself. Give yourself a name and backstory, then the story will address you accordingly.
faq.q8: Can I replay a story with different choices?
faq.a8: Yes! Click 'New Adventure' on any story page. Each playthrough is independent — explore different paths and endings.
faq.a9: Stories are available in 7 languages: English, Russian, Spanish, French, German, Portuguese, and Italian. The interface and AI responses adapt to your language.
faq.a10: For long adventures, the AI automatically summarizes earlier events so it remembers your choices and important story details throughout the narrative.
faq.a11: Yes! Stories you create can be made public for others to play. Share them via direct link or let others discover them on the homepage.
faq.q12: Is the content safe for all ages?
faq.a12: All stories on GrimQuill are SFW (safe for work). Content is moderated to ensure a safe and enjoyable experience for everyone.
